entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:47 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:47 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Overcast. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:47 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
